# Valid Test Skill

This is a test skill for integration testing.

Use this skill to test argument substitution: $ARGUMENTS

First arg: $0
Second arg: $1

## Features

- Demonstrates proper YAML frontmatter
- Shows markdown body structure
- Includes argument placeholders for testing
